entry.string: Are you sure you want to delete ?
Must be a valid date [format: YYYY-MM-DD]
Search for target key word/number in the invoice number field
Search for target key word/number in the order number field
Click box if only non fully paid invoices are to be retrieved. Make sure you have completed all payment allocation before checking on unsettled invoices
List of Invoices (click column heading to re-sort table)
To recalculate Due Date, clear the Due Date field and click [Refresh Page]
If assembly/package is not to be exploded, choose it from the normal Product/Parts or Services sections of the item list
Remember to perform/adjust receipt allocation and attibutes
Search for target key word/number in the remark field
If the PAID/UNPAID Lists get too complicated, press [clear allocation] button to start afresh
Error: Statement Start later than Statement End
Error: Statement date earlier than Statement End
For Credit Balance, there is no need to pay/remit
Statement Image (Use browser print function to output the statement shown above):
[This is a sample subject to tailoring per individual printer & invoice format]
For email function to work, your email/DNS environment must be properly setup.
To generate statement of a different period, modify the appropriate statement field(s), then press regenerate.
To search for all items, leave fields blank
Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
List of Receipts (click column heading to re-sort table)
List of Customers (click column heading to re-sort table)
Prefix to be used for invoice numbers
Prefix to be used for sales order numbers
